title: Salvia officinalis extract in the treatment of patients with mild to moderate Alzheimer’s disease
population: Adults with mild to moderate Alzheimer’s disease
results_summary: This randomized double-blind trial evaluated salvia officinalis extract in adults with mild to moderate Alzheimer’s disease. Results showed that improvement in cognitive outcomes compared with placebo; mostly minor adverse events reported. Effects were generally modest and safety signals were acceptable, but larger and longer trials are recommended.
mla_citation: “Salvia officinalis extract in the treatment of patients with mild to moderate Alzheimer’s disease.” PubMed, 2003, https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12605619/. Accessed 24 Oct. 2025.
